episodes.title: Calvary Chapel Moses Model of Power, Faith, and Abuse
episodes.description: These sources provide an extensive overview of allegations involving **abuse and systemic misconduct** within the Calvary Chapel network of churches, highlighting multiple cases where pastors and volunteers were accused of **sexual abuse, addiction, financial impropriety, and spiritual trauma**. Several articles detail specific high-profile cases, such as **Bob Coy, founder of Calvary Chapel Fort Lauderdale**, accused of child molestation, and **Rodney Finch, pastor of Calvary Chapel Cary**, facing unresolved complaints of drug addiction and financial mismanagement. Furthermore, the texts discuss the **lack of accountability** for leaders, often attributed to the Calvary Chapel's **"Moses model" of governance**, which grants senior pastors almost absolute authority. Finally, one source describes the extreme and allegedly abusive conditions of a **persecution-themed "Patmos" discipleship camp** run by an assistant pastor, further illustrating the pattern of uncontrolled environments within the movement.

episodes.title: Harvest Christian Fellowship Abuse Lawsuit

Harvest Christian Fellowship Lawsuit, Greg Laurie, Paul Haavsgard.
